game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple lies hidden deep in the jungle, rumored to contain a powerful relic. Your mission is to infiltrate the temple, navigate its deadly traps, and retrieve the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the lost temple.
task.description: The temple is hidden behind a waterfall. Search the surrounding area for any signs of its existence.
The temple is filled with ancient pitfalls and poison darts. Use your wits to avoid them and reach the artifact room.
The artifact is located in a locked chest. Find the hidden key and claim your reward.
